name: rebalancing-zkp
description: Zero-Knowledge proof system for portfolio rebalancing validation using Circom, Groth16, and ERC-8004

scripts.forge:build: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge build
scripts.forge:test: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge test -vvv
scripts.forge:deploy:local: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast && cd .. && ts-node scripts/create-deployed-contracts.ts
scripts.forge:deploy:sepolia: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $RPC_URL_SEPOLIA --broadcast && cd .. && ts-node scripts/create-deployed-contracts.ts
scripts.forge:deploy:base-sepolia: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $RPC_URL_BASE_SEPOLIA --broadcast && cd .. && ts-node scripts/create-deployed-contracts.ts
scripts.forge:clean: export PATH="$HOME/.foundry/bin:$PATH" && cd contracts && forge clean
scripts.clean: npm run clean:zkp && npm run clean:ts && npm run forge:clean
